snippet: At Trademarkia, “We want to make applying for a trademark as easy as getting a domain name,” said Raj Abhyanker, one of the company’s founders.
abstract: At Trademarkia, “We want to make applying for a trademark as easy as getting a domain name,” said Raj Abhyanker, one of the company’s founders.

headline.main: A Start-Up Rethinks the Process of Getting a Trademark
